pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10,8,7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 2,3 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 560 GTX 2 GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10,8
  • Processor: Intel Core I7, 3,0 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 4 GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
